title: Bash Release Kit Configuration
description: Configuration file for the Bash Release Kit automation tool.

$schema.description: Link to the JSON Schema for validation and autocompletion.

active.description: Indicates whether GitHub integration is active.

commitTypes.description: Define custom behavior for commit types (bumping logic and changelog sections).

section.description: The title to display in the Changelog for this type. If omitted, the type group might be hidden or use a default.

bump.description: The Semantic Versioning impact of this commit type.

hidden.description: If true, commits of this type will be excluded from the Changelog.
